long_description: Giro Factress Bike Shoes offer exceptional performance on the open road, with luxurious style and fit tailored just for women. Teijin(R) premium lightweight microfiber upper conforms to your foot without binding. Easton(R) EC90 unidirectional carbon fiber outsole is 6.5mm thin, and drives every ounce of your energy into forward motion. Ratcheting buckle closure lets you make adjustments on the fly, and is replaceable. Offset strap D-ring is located at midfoot. Giro Factress Bike Shoes offer adjustable arch support with the SuperNatural Fit Kit; includes low, medium and high arch supports you can easily swap out on the footbed. X-Static(R) antimicrobial footbed topsheet manages odor.
short_description: Giro Factress Bike Shoes offer exceptional performance on the open road, with luxurious style and fit tailored just for women.
